member.name: T:Maui.CommunityToolkit.TabView.Compat.BadgeView
member.summary: The allows the user to show a badge with a string value on top of any control. By wrapping a control in a control, you can show a badge value on top of it. This is very much like the badges you see on the app icons on iOS and Android.
